Q. Whom do you want to petition?
A. Heads of government and warring factions.

Q. What do you want them to do?
A. Call a cease fire for 24 hours.

Q. Why is this important?
A. World peace should be important to every man, woman and child.

Imagin this scenario:
In that 24 hours the waring factions withdraw and lay down their arms, a young child which would have been killed by an explosion instead, isn't.
What if that child then goes on to find a cure for cancer or discovers a technology to end world hunger?

This is a possibility as a result of just 24 hours of peace.
